channel.title: How do i change so the my client will connect to my ip?
channel.description: i have downloaded eyrescape open 377 open client but i dont know how to make it connect to my ip.. couse i whant my friends to connect to it to.. please help! cmon! i know that alot of ppl know about this..

item.title: How do i change so the my client will connect to my ip?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

you didn’t make your own, you just change names background and anything with eyrescape

ok search for

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0x1C86EE

ok under that there should be a ip. Change that whole line to

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0x1C86EE, "@bla@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@red@|" : "@dre@"), j); j += 15;
then when you compile the client and run it there should be a line “Server Ip:” then you type in the ip to your server.
That easy.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change so the my client will connect to my ip?

item.title: How do i change so the my client will connect to my ip?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

In the clients client.java, search for:

server = "";

Inside the parenthesis("") put your servers Ip address.
